snippet: Kyle Singler scored 18 points to lead seven Detroit players in double figures, Andre Drummond had 18 rebounds as the Pistons ended Miami’s winning streak at 10 games.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Detroit Pistons beat Miami Heat, 107-97; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Singler scored 18 points to lead seven Detroit players in double figures, Andre Drummond had 18 rebounds as the Pistons ended Miami’s winning streak at 10 games.

headline.main: Loss to Pistons Ends Heat’s Hot Streak
headline.print_headline: Loss to Pistons Ends Heat’s Hot Streak
